content.text: Vivid Voltage electrifies the battlefield with high-voltage Pokémon and explosive strategies. Featuring Electric-type Pokémon, dynamic abilities, and powerful new mechanics like Amazing Pokémon, this expansion rewards Trainers who strike fast and think strategically. With stunning artwork, shocking attacks, and gameplay that crackles with energy, Vivid Voltage invites you to spark your deck, dominate the field, and unleash electrifying victories.
